data.title: EMC® Documentum® Quality And Manufacturing
data.meta_description: Getting to market quickly is critical to the success of your business. In short, that requires running lean, efficient and uninterrupted...
data.text:
Getting to market quickly is critical to the success of your business. In short, that requires running lean, efficient and uninterrupted manufacturing production at the lowest possible cost. But how efficiently you manage document creation, review, approval and change management can impact time to market, especially when you're dependent upon a global, virtual extended enterprise.

By automating this process using the EMC Documentum Quality and Manufacturing (Documentum Q&M) solution, you can eliminate time-consuming manual review and approval efforts and gain centralized document control—all while adhering to compliance requirements and mitigating the risk of fines and production delays.

ESSENTIALS

Gain centralized control over—and visibility into—all quality and manufacturing documents

Streamline the creation, review, approval and change management of documents governing manufacturing, quality and compliance procedures across the extended enterprise

Use an industry-standard, out-of-the-box document taxonomy to quickly create documents, and then search, retrieve and navigate them

Automate distribution of new, effective documentation internally and externally

Leverage flexible lifecycle support for multiple control levels within a single repository

Link content across repositories for consistent, simplified document management and user access

Leverage a proven, trusted, scalable platform that's cloud-ready
